name: Asva The Monkey HD
storyline: Long time ago, there were a secret place hidden deep in a forest. There, lived a peaceful tribe of monkeys. ASVA was a lazy little monkey. One day, he saw a magical light, and when he tried to touch it, he plummeted into a dark portal. Now he's trapped in the unknown, mysterious worlds. And the only way to get back home is to solve the puzzle within those worlds. Now it's your turn to help ASVA get back home. The game is on, you have to solve the puzzles in order to help ASVA back home.
summary: Asva The Monkey HD is a simple, yet fun and addictive puzzle game. Test your brain with the touch of your finger!
